H0.text: The medical condition aphakia affects which part of the body. Brain

H1.text: The medical condition aphakia affects which part of the body. Ear

H2.text: The medical condition aphakia affects which part of the body. Nose

H3.text: The medical condition aphakia affects which part of the body. Eye

A4.text: Aphakia is the absence of the lens of the eye

A5.text: It causes a loss of ability to maintain focus (accommodation), high degree of farsightedness (hyperopia), and a deep anterior chamber
